snippet: An 11-year-old boy was in custody Monday on charges that he killed an 8-year-old neighbor with a shotgun because she would not show him her puppies, the authorities said.
abstract: Unidentified 11-year-old boy is charged with first-degree murder as  juvenile after he fatally shot 8-year-old Maykayla Dyer with his father's 12-gauge shotgun, said Sheriff G W McCoig of Jefferson County, Tennessee; court appearance in late October will determine whether he will be convicted as an adult.
lead_paragraph: An 11-year-old boy was in custody Monday on charges that he killed an 8-year-old neighbor with a shotgun because she would not show him her puppies, the authorities said.

headline.main: Tennessee: Boy Accused of Killing Girl Over Puppies
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Boy Accused of Killing Girl Over Puppies
